settings.announcement_text: Save 15% off MOTHER'S DAY ORDERS OVER $50 with code MOM15

settings.sub_heading: Shop Mother's Day gifts and save 15% off orders over $50 with code MOM15.
settings.main_heading: Treat mom to something as sweet as she is!

settings.product_ingredients_1: Milk, Dark & White Chocolatey Drizzle | Pretzels | Caramel | Pecans
settings.product_description_1: Crunchy, salty pretzels laced with chewy, gooey caramel and a ton of chocolatey decadence make our Chocolate Pretzel mix so outright irresistible!
settings.nutrition_text_1:
Milk, Dark & White Chocolatey Drizzle (Sugar, Palm Kernel and Palm Oil, Cocoa Powder, Nonfat Dry Milk, Whey Powder, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Natural Flavor, Milk Solids), Pretzels (Enriched Flour [Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid], Water, Canola Oil, Salt, Malt [Tapioca Syrup, Malt Extract], Yeast, Baking Soda), Caramel (Corn Syrup, Sweetened Condensed Milk [Milk, Sugar], Sugar, Palm Oil, Water, Butter [Cream, Salt], Salt, Vanilla Extract, Soy Lecithin), Pecans (Roasted in Sunflower Oil, Sea Salt). 

Contains: Milk, Soy, Wheat, Pecans. 

Manufactured in a facility that uses: Peanuts & other Tree Nuts.
settings.product_ingredients_2: Milk & Dark Chocolatey Drizzle | Caramel Corn | Caramel | Cashews | Sea Salt

Manufactured in a facility that uses: Milk, Soy, Wheat, Peanuts & Tree Nuts.
settings.product_ingredients_3: Caramel Corn | Peanut Butter Drizzle | Milk Chocolate Drizzle | Mini Peanut Butter Cups | Peanuts
settings.product_description_3: Turn on your tongue with this serious popcorn mix. The combination of peanut butter and chocolate is an obvious heartbreaker, but we amped up that delight with swirls of peanut buttery and milk chocolatey drizzle.

Caramel Corn (Sugar, Popcorn, Corn Syrup, Corn Oil, Water, Butter [Cream, Salt], Brown Sugar, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Natural Flavor), Peanut Buttery Drizzle (Sugar, Palm Kernel Oil, Partially Defatted Peanut Flour, Nonfat Dry Milk, Peanut Oil, Salt, Soy Lecithin), Milk Chocolatey Drizzle (Sugar, Palm Kernel and Palm Oil, Nonfat Dry Milk, Cocoa Powder, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Natural Flavor), Mini Peanut Butter Cups (Milk Chocolate [Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Chocolate, Milk, Soy Lecithin, Natural Flavor], Sugar, Partially Defatted Peanut Flour, Nonfat Milk, Peanut Butter [Peanuts, Salt], Salt, Soy Lecithin), Peanuts (Roasted in Sunflower Oil, Sea Salt).

Manufactured in a facility that uses: Milk, Soy, Wheat, Peanuts & Tree Nuts.
settings.product_ingredients_4: Milk, Dark & White Chocolatey Drizzle | Caramel Corn | Potato Chips | Pretzel Sticks | Caramel
settings.product_description_4: We've created a safe word for your midnight cravings: Chip Zel Pop. The satisfying bite of salty chips and pretzels is the classic go-to snack.
settings.nutrition_text_4:
Milk, Dark & White Chocolatey Drizzle (Sugar, Palm Kernel and Palm Oil, Cocoa Powder, Nonfat Dry Milk, Whey Powder, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Natural Flavor, Milk Solids), Caramel Corn (Sugar, Popcorn, Corn Syrup, Corn Oil, Water, Butter [Cream, Salt], Brown Sugar, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Natural Flavor), Potato Chips (Potatoes, Canola and/or Sunflower Oil, Salt), Pretzel Sticks (Enriched Wheat Flour [Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid], Salt, Vegetable Oil [Corn, Canola, Cottonseed and/or Soybean Oil], Corn Syrup, Yeast), Caramel (Corn Syrup, Sweetened Condensed Milk [Milk, Sugar], Sugar, Palm Oil, Water, Butter [Cream, Salt], Salt, Vanilla Extract, Soy Lecithin).

settings.product_ingredients_5: Milk, Dark & White Chocolatey Drizzle | Caramel Corn | Glazed Almonds | Glazed Cashews

settings.product_ingredients_6: White Chocolate Drizzle | Caramel Corn | Rainbow Non-Pareils | Vanilla Cream | Natural Flavors
settings.product_description_6: This celebratory Birthday Cake Flavored Popcorn is swirled with white chocolatey frosting and coated with vanilla cream.
settings.nutrition_text_6:
Note: “Servings per Container” equals number of ounces in the container’s net weight. (Whole Number)  

INGREDIENTS: White Chocolatey Drizzle (Sugar, Palm Kernel and Palm Oil, Whey Powder, Nonfat Dry  Milk Solids, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Natural Flavor), Caramel Corn (Sugar, Corn Syrup, Butter [Cream, Salt],  Popcorn, Vanilla Extract, Salt, Soy Lecithin), Rainbow Non-Pareils (Sugar, Corn Starch, Candy Colors (Red  40, Red 3, Yellow 5, Yellow 6, Blue 1), Carnauba Wax), Natural Flavors (Annatto & Turmeric [for color]),  Vanilla Cream (Cream, Natural Flavor). 

Contains: Milk, Soy. 

Manufactured in a facility that uses: Milk, Soy, Wheat, Peanuts & Tree Nuts.
settings.product_ingredients_7: Caramel Corn | White Chocolatey Drizzle | Caramel | Cappuccino White Espresso Beans | Natural Coffee Flavor | Natural Flavor
settings.product_description_7: Upgrade your sweet tooth. We start with our decadent, buttery caramel popcorn and then drizzle vanilla sweet crème white chocolatey goodness, chewy caramel, and a sprinkle of white chocolate covered espresso beans.

Note: “Servings per Container” equals number of ounces in the container’s net weight. (Whole Number)

settings.product_ingredients_8: Caramel Corn | Milk & White Chocolatey Drizzle | Caramel | Chocolate Espresso Beans | Natural Coffee Flavor

settings.body: Online Only. To receive free shipping discount, cart subtotal must exceed $75 AFTER all other promotions are applied. Total must be per address. No code needed.
settings.body_2: Online Only. Must enter code MOM15 in the MY Cart or Checkout Page to receive discount. Applies to cost of product only, does not apply to shipping. To receive discount, cart subtotal must exceed $50 before shipping.
